00034 include_once("../../include.inc.php");
00035 
00036 $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'altq') {
00040     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00041     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'altq';
00042 }
00043 
00044 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00045     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00046     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00047 }
00048 
00049 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save']) && isset($rule['identifier'])) {
00050     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00051     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber];
00052 }
00053 
00054 if (isset($_GET['dropqueue'])) {
00055     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->delEntity ("queue", $_GET['rulenumber'], $_GET['dropqueue']);
00056     for ($i = '0'; $i < count($_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules); $i++) {
00057         if ($_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$i]['name'] ==  $_GET['dropqueue']) {
00058             $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->del ($i);
00059         }
00060     }
00061     reload();
00062 }
00063 
00064 if (isset($_POST['addqueue']) && (!preg_match("/ueue name/", $_POST['addqueue']))) {
00065     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->addEntity("queue", $rulenumber, preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['addqueue']));
00066     $_newQueue = $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->addRule();
00067     $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->rules[$_newQueue]['name'] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['addqueue']);
00068     $_SESSION['edit']['addedQueues'][] = $_newQueue;
00069 
00070     reload();
00071 }
00072 
00073 if (count($_POST)) {
00074     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['interface'] =   $_POST['interface'];
00075     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['bandwidth'] =   $_POST['bandwidth'];
00076     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['scheduler'] =   $_POST['scheduler'];
00077     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['qlimit'] =        $_POST['qlimit'];
00078     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['tbrsize'] =     $_POST['tbrsize'];
00079     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] =     $_POST['comment'];
00080     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber];
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*
00084 * go back
00085 */
00086 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00087     $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00088     if (!isset($_SESSION['pfw']->altq->rules[$rulenumber]['interface'])) {
00089         $_SESSION['pfw']->altq->del ($rulenumber);
00090         foreach ($_SESSION['edit']['addedQueues'] as $_newQueue) {
00091             $_SESSION['pfw']->queue->del ($_newQueue);
00092         }
00093     }
00094     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00095     header ("Location: queue.php");
00096 }
00097 
00098 if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00099     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00100     header ("Location: queue.php");
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*
00104 * Begin Output
00105 */
00106 $active = "queue";
00107 page_header("Edit Queue");
00108
